texts.es: El joven Erick Manuel tiene la edad de 29 años habita en la Concepción, junto a su mamá y hermanos este joven es muy trabajador, se dedica a la agricultura y a la vez trabaja en una empresa para poder ayudarle con los gastos del hogar a su mamá y hermanos .E l papá de l joven le ayuda en la finca para que el vaya a trabajar. Los sueños de este joven es llegar a establecer una manzana más piña. Ya que el se siente muy contento por el apoyo que le brinda nuestra financiera. El solicita la cantidad de C$ 10,000.00 córdobas para darle el mantenimiento necesario al cultivo en la fertilización y abono del cultivo.

loans.use: Comprar abono y veneno para el cultivo

loans.name: Adelia

texts.es: Adelia tiene 29 años, vive con su esposo y sus 2 hijos. Desde muy joven se ha dedicado a la agricultura, siembra papa, cebada, arveja, habas y tarwui, que son productos nativos de su tierra, junto con su esposo cosechan y luego los ponen en costales para llevarlos a vender al por mayor en los mercados cercanos a su localidad. También tiene animales, que son para su consumo propio, ahora se está preparando nuevamente para la siembra. Es la primera vez que Adelia solicita un préstamo en MFP y promete ser cumplidora de sus cuentas. Esta cantidad la invertirá en su campaña de siembra de papa, para ello comprará sacos de abono para la preparación de su tierra.
texts.en:
Adelia B. T. is 29 years old. She lives with her husband and two children. Adelia has worked in agriculture since she was very young. Today she sows potatos, barley, peas, beans and 'tarwui', all of which are products native to her land. Adelia and her husband harvest together, place the products in sacks and take them to markets near their town to sell them at wholesale. The family also has animals for their own use. Adelia is once again preparing herself for this year's harvest. This is the first time that Adelia asks for a loan from MFP and she promises to keep up with what she owes. She will invest this quantity in her potato harvest by buying sacks of fertilizer to prepare the earth.

Translated from Spanish by Miriam Hidalgo, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy sacks of fertilizer for her crops

loans.name: Maria Ester

texts.es: La señora Maria Ester P. tiene la edad de 35 años, habita en el barrio san caralampio ubicado en La Concepción. Junto a su esposo y hijos, el esposo trabaja como conductor para apoyarle con los gastos de la casa, ella se siente muy apoyada por la mano amiga de Afodenic; ya que ella a logrado establecer un poco mas su negocio, lo cual tiene un poco de variedad, con esta solicitud va invertir mas en ropa y adornos navideños par ala temporada de la navidad y así ofertar a sus clientes y captación de otros, la mayor dificultad que anteriormente había tenido era la falta de financiamiento  , pero ella alega que ya no le preocupa por que nuestra financiera siempre le apoya .Los sueños de esta señora es llegar a tener una micelania para poder darle una mejor condición de vida a su familia .
texts.en:
Ms. Maria Ester P. is 35 years old and lives in the San Caralampio neighborhood, located in La Concepción, with her husband and children. Her husband works as a driver in order to help with the household expenses. She feels that she has been supported by Afodenic’s helping hand because she has managed to get her business, which now offers more variety, a little more established. She will invest this loan in clothing and Christmas ornaments for the holiday season, that way, she can offer more products to her customers as well as bring in more customers. Her greatest problem is that she had previously had a lack of funds, but she claims that she no longer worries about that because our microfinance institute always supports her. She dreams of setting up a general store in order to improve her family’s quality of life.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Casian, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase clothing for children and adults

loans.name: Lena Karen

texts.es:
La Señora Lena Karen R. C. vive en la zona de Sopocachi, un barrio residencial de la ciudad de La Paz, Bolivia. Trabajaba como proyectista en su propia microempresa que se dedica a la instalación de gas domiciliario en la ciudad del El Alto, Bolivia.
Este crédito será destoinado a la compra del material necesario, como ser: tubos, varillas, válvulas, medidores, etc. debido a que actualmente el negocio ha sido bastante exitoso y tiene muchas instalaciones pendientes. Es una microempresaria bastante exitosa y gracias al microcrédito ha podido salir adelante.
texts.en:
Señora Lena Karen R. C. lives in the Sopocachi zone, a residential neighborhood in the city of La Paz, Bolivia. She worked as a planner for her own small company that installs gas in homes in the city of El Alton, Bolivia. This loan is going to be used in the purchase of needed materials like: pipes, rods, valves, meters, etc. since her business has been pretty successful and has many more pending installations. She is a small-business woman who has been quite successful and, thanks to microcredit, she has been able to get ahead.

Translated from Spanish by Joanna Silverman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Increase in Capital

loans.name: Cristobal Evaristo

texts.es: El señor Cristóbal Evaristo tiene la edad de 39 años habita en el barrio Pablo Calero junto a u esposa y hijos, la señora trabaja como comerciante en el mercado Oriental en la capital de Managua, para ayudarle con los gastos de la casa, don Cristóbal la mayor dificultad que ha tenido es la falta de financiamiento y con sus propios esfuerzos ha logrado mantener un poco el cultivo. El solicita la cantidad de C$ 8,000.00 córdobas para poder aplicar insumos a la plantación y así poder obtener una buena cosecha y vender en un buen precio.
texts.en:
Señor Cristóbal Evaristo is 39 years of age and lives in the Pablo Calero neighborhood with her wife and children. His wife works as a merchant in the Oriental market in the capital of Managua to help with the household expenses. The greatest difficulty for Don Cristóbal is a lack of funding. With his own efforts he has succeeded in maintaining a bit of farming. He asks for 8,000 in Córdobas ($425) to be able to provide materials to his farmland and, that way, have a better harvest and sell at a better price.

Translated from Spanish by Joanna Silverman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and poisons for farming

loans.name: Geovana

texts.es: La Señora Geovanna A. C., tiene una pequeña tienda en alquiler, en una populosa zona de la ciudad de La Paz, Bolivia, en la tienda se dedica a la venta de abarrotes y otros productos para el hogar, paralelamente y durante el día, mientras vende sus productos, se dedica a la confección de  edredones, carteras, y adornos de cola de rata; productos que comercializa en su misma tienda, con tanto éxito que ya cuenta con maquinaria para la confeccion de edredones. Cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo, quien le ayuda con los gastos familiares. Aspira a mejorar su negocio y poder tener una pequeña microempresa, que se dedique a la fabricación de todo tipo de productos para el hogar. El crédito será invertido en la compra de materia prima, debido a que se ¡acercan las fiestas de fin de año, una buena época para incrementar su estock de productos.
texts.en:
Señora Geovanna A. C. has a small shop she rents in a populated zone in the city of La Paz, Bolivia. In the store she sells groceries and other products for the home. At the same time and during the day, while she sells products, she makes quilts, wallets, and decorations made out of ribbon; products she sells in her shop. With such success, she now relies on a machine to make quilts. She counts on the support of her husband who helps her with the family's expenses. She aims to improve her business and to be able to have a small business that will make all kinds of products for the home. The loan will be invested in the purchase of raw materials since the end of the year holidays are approaching it is a good season to increase her stock of products.

Translated from Spanish by Joanna Silverman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Increase in Capital

loans.name: Armando

texts.es: Armando tiene 54 años, vive solo. Trabaja ofreciendo el servicio de fotocopiado y  escritura por computadora desde hace 8 años, para ello arrendó un local que se ubica en la carretera principal de su comunidad, siendo una zona comercial y donde todos sus vecinos acuden para solicitarle sus servicios, de esta manera  Armando tiene los ingresos necesarios para  seguir adelante. Es la primera vez que solicita un préstamo en MFP y se compromete a ser puntual en la devolución de su préstamo. Solicita este dinero para reparar y dar mantenimiento a su computadora y a su fotocopiadora.
texts.en:
Armando is 54 years old and lives alone. For the past 8 years he has owned and operated a photocopy and computer business. Armando rents a space on the main street of his community, because it is a commercial area and is a location which all of his neighbors pass during the day. In this way, Armando earns the income he needs to be successful. This is the first time that Armando has asked for a loan from MFP and he promises to return it on time. He is asking for this money to repair his computer and photocopy machine.

Translated from Spanish by Jordan Shanker, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Repair computer and photocopy machine

loans.name: Cesar

texts.es: Cesar tiene 40 años, vive con su esposa y sus 5 hijos. Casi toda su vida ha trabajado en la agricultura y hoy más que nunca esto le sirve para que pueda sostener a su familia, por ello él y su esposa se levantan muy temprano para poder ir al campo para ver sus tierras y pastear a sus animales, regresan cuando esta por cerrar el día, cuidan celosamente de sus cultivos porque de ellos depende las ganancias de su esfuerzo. Con este trabajo Cesar ha podido establecer su familia y su casa, esporádicamente el sale a la feria ganadera para vender sus animales cuando es una emergencia de gasto  porque la mayor parte es para el consumo propio de su familia. Es la primera vez que Cesar solicita un préstamo en MFP, por lo que s e compromete ser puntual en sus pagos. Solicita este dinero con el que podrá comprar sacos de abono para sembrar papa en una de sus tierras de cultivo.
texts.en:
Cesar is 40, lives with his wife and five children. He has worked in farming almost all of his life and now more than ever agriculture helps him support his family, that’s why he and his wife get up very early to go to the land and check on their crops, feed their livestock and return home close to the end of the day, they take jealous care of their crops because on them depends the profit of their effort. With this work Cesar has been able to support his family, his house, sporadically he attends the livestock fair to sell his animals when an emergency expense presents itself, otherwise most of the animals are for his family's consumption. This is the first time that Cesar requests a loan through Microfinanzas Prisma, for which he commits to be punctual on his repayments. He requests the money to buy fertilizer to grow potatoes in his land.

Translated from Spanish by Sofia Burt, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy fertilizer

loans.name: Felix

texts.es: Félix tiene 55 años, y vive con su anciana madre de 80 años. Desde su niñez se ha dedicado a las tareas agrícolas, es por ello que siempre ha visto la mejor manera de dedicarse a este rubro, a pesar de su limitación física de visión, el contrata  peones para que puedan sembrar sus tierras y busca la ayuda de sus familiares para  ayudarle a identificar el dinero que produce como ganancias de sus ventas. Últimamente, Félix el ha intensificado sus actividades a la crianza de animales, por lo que también sale a vender estos, él compra toretes y vacas flacas, los engorda y vuelve a venderlos. Es la primera ve que Félix solicita un préstamo en MFP, tiene buenas referencia de los vecinos que lo rodean como una persona responsable. Solicita esta cantidad con las cual comprará sacos de abono para sembrar cebada en una de sus tierras de cultivo.
texts.en:
Felix is 55, and lives with his 80 year old elderly mother. Since childhood he has been involved in agricultural activities, reason why he has always found a way to work in this industry, in spite of his vision disability. He hires workers to work the land and finds the help from his family with handling the money produced from the sales. Lately, Felix has expanded to raising livestock, which he also sells. He buys young cattle and cows, and when they are grown and heavy, he sells them. This is the first time that Felix requests a loan with Microfinanzas Prisma, he has good references from his neighbours who consider him a responsible person. He requests this amount to buy fertilizer and grow barley in part of his land.

Translated from Spanish by Sofia Burt, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy fertilizer

loans.name: Andrea Del Socorro

texts.es: La señora Andrea del socorro M. tiene la edad de 48 años, habita en el barrio El Edén ubicado en el municipio de Ticuantepe junto a su esposo y hijos, el esposo de la señora trabaja como taxista para poder ayudarle con los gastos de casa. La señora Andrea  se dedica ala agricultura y al comercio, la mayor dificultad que ha tenido es la falta de financiamiento, ya que la tierras que ella cultivas son herencia del papá, los hijos de la señora le apoyan En la agricultura para poder tener mayor ganancia y que ella no pague personal. Ella solicita el préstamo para comprar insumos como venenos y abonos para lograr buena cosecha y ofertar mejor en el mercado
texts.en:
Señora Andrea del Socorro M. is 48 years old and lives in the neighborhood of El Edén located in the municipality of Ticuantepe with her husband and children. Her husband works as a taxi driver to be able to help with the household expenses. Señora Andrea works in agriculture and in commerce. The greatest difficulty she has had is the lack of funding since she inherited farmland from her father. Her children support her in agriculture to be able in improve her income and so that she does not have to pay personally. She asks for the loan to buy materials like poisons and fertilizers to have a good harvest and to offer better products in the market.

Translated from Spanish by Joanna Silverman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To Purchase Materials like Fertilizers and Poisons for Farming

loans.name: Freddy

texts.es: Freddy tiene 20 años, vive con su esposa. Freddy ha trabajado toda su vida en la agricultura y ganadería, heredó de sus padres sus tierras y animales, es así que con mucha dedicación está sembrando papa, arveja, quinua entre otros productos, nativos de su tierra. Durante el día trabaja sin tener un horario fijo, espera poder ver pronto la recompensa de su trabajo, después de varios meses de cosecha. Así mismo, ha sembrado pastizales para sus animales y cada semana, los días viernes los vende en la feria ganadera de su localidad, por lo cual su deseo es incrementar lo que posee para que pueda dar toda la comodidad a sus hijos que han de venir. Es la primera vez que Freddy  solicita un préstamo en MFP, por lo la cual se compromete en ser un cliente responsable con sus pagos. La cantidad solicitada será invertida en sus actividades agrícolas, comprando un saco de abono y un torito más para su ganado, lo que le permitirá posteriormente venderlo engordado en la feria ganadera.
texts.en:
Freddy is 20 and lives with his wife. Freddy has worked all of his life in agriculture and livestock, he inherited the land and animals from his parents, with a lot of dedication he grows potatoes, peas, quinoa and other products native to his land. During the day he works without a set schedule, he hopes to soon see the reward from his work, after a few months of harvest. He has also grown feed for his livestock and every week, on Fridays, he sells them in the local livestock fair, his wish is to expand to be able to provide a comfort life to his future children. This is the first time that Freddy requests a loan through Microfinanzas Prisma, and he commits to be responsible with repayments. The amount requested will be invested in agricultural activities, buying a sack of fertilizer and a small bull that he will raise and sell at the livestock fair.

Translated from Spanish by Sofia Burt, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and cattle

loans.name: Luis Alfonso

texts.es: El señor Luís Alfonso R. tiene la edad de 44 años habita en San José Los Ríos, junto a su esposa  Y hijos, la esposa le apoya con los gastos del hogar ya que ella es comerciante tiene un puesto de venta en mercado oriental en la capital de Managua, don Luís trabaja en la agricultura desde hace Veinte años, el mayor problema que tiene es la falta de financiamiento, don Luís cultivas esas tierras ya que su papá se las heredo; sus planes hacia un futuro es logra establecer mas cultivos para poder ayudarles a sus hijas hacer su casa.  Con la solicitud del préstamo es para invertir en el cultivo Para establecer  manzana y media de cultivo de piña, para obtener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Señor Luís Alfonso R. is 44 years of age and lives in San José Los Ríos with his wife and children. His wife helps support him in the household expenses now that she is a merchant with a stall in the oriental market in the capital of Managua. Don Luís has worked in agriculture for 20 years. The biggest problem he has is a lack of funding. Don Luís cultivates the lands that he inherited from his father. His plans for the future are to succeed in establishing more farmland to be able to help his daughters build homes. He requests this loan to invest in farming to establish acreage and a means of growing pineapple to make better income.

Translated from Spanish by Joanna Silverman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To Purchase Materials like Fertilizers and Poisons for Farming

loans.name: Grover Gerardo

texts.es: El Señor Grover A., se dedica a la fabricación de artesanías hechas de cola de rata en la populosa feria 16 de julio de la ciudad de El Alto, Bolivia, artesanías que vende  de manera ambulante por toda la feria, los días jueves y domingo. Paralelamente el señor trabaja como bartender en un conocido café de la ciudad de La Paz. El préstamo será destinado para la adquisicion de una cafeteria y confiteria en la zona de ciudad de El Alto. El señor es soltero y trabaja arduamente con el objetivo de mejorar su calidad de vida. Aspira a tener su cafetería propia. Es una persona muy responsable, y tiene buenas referencias por parte de sus padres y de quienes lo conocen.
texts.en:
Mr. Grover A. makes crafts made of ribbon at the popular 16th of July fair in the city of El Alto, Bolivia, crafts that he sells across the fair on Thursdays and Sundays. In addition, he works as a bartender in a known coffee place of the city of La Paz. The loan will be used to acquire a cafeteria and confectionery in the city of El Alto. He is single and works hard with the purpose of improving his quality of life. He hopes to have his own cafeteria. He is a very responsible person, has good references from his parents and those who know him.

Translated from Spanish by Sofia Burt, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To acquire a cafeteria

loans.name: Paubla Francis

texts.es: Doña Francis tiene 32 años de edad, habita en un barrio que se llama Laureles Sur en la capital de Managua, junto a su esposo y hijos menores de edad de 5 y 12 años de edad, que estudian la primaria en el escuelita del barrio, su esposo labora en como guarda de seguridad gana poco, ella tiene que trabajar para su familia ya que todo esta caro, se desempeña en una casa particular en servicios domésticos desde hace tres años, es un trabajo cansado por que la casa es grande, y lo mas difícil para ella ha sido ganarse la confianza de sus patrones, su mama le ve los niños ya que llega hasta en la noche, con esta solicitud es la séptima la cual ha sido de muchos beneficios ya que ha mejorado su vivienda poco a poco con la facilidad y oportunidad que Afodenic ha brindado, con esta préstamo quiere hacer un sumidero ya que el que tiene esta en mal estado, para esto va a comprar materiales de construcción como piedra, arena, cemento, hierro, para estar higiénico con su familia.
texts.en:
Francis is 32 years old and lives in the Laureles Sur neighborhood in the capital of Managua with her husband and children, ages 5 and 12, who attend the local elementary school. Her husband works as a security guard, but earns little money. Francis has to work for her family because everything is expensive. She has worked as a maid for the past three years, but the job is tiring because the house she cleans is very large. The most difficult part has been gaining the trust of her employers. Francis' mother watches over her children for her during the day, as Francis arrives home from work late. This loan will be the seventh, all of which have been very beneficial as she has improved her home little by little with the opportunity Afodenic has offered her. With this loan Francis wants to construct a drain, as her current one is in disrepair. For this, she is going to purchase construction materials such as stones, sand, cement, and iron so that her family maintains good hygiene.

Translated from Spanish by Jordan Shanker, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase construction materials to make a drain.

loans.name: Merlinda Karim

texts.es: La sra. Merlinda trabaja desde el año 2005 con Emprender, se dedica a la venta de comida en una parada de buses, es muy conocida por este sector porque tiene también una movilidad, un minibús que hace trabajaro para transporte público, es una señora muy trabajadora y aprendió a ser independiente desde muy joven y ahora se mantiene a sí misma, no tiene hijos y está estudiando odontología en la universidad pública, piensa abrir su propio consultorio cuando termine sus estudios. El crédito será invertido en la compra de insumos como arroz, fideo, harina, verdura, para la cocina. Es una cliente muy responsable y puntual.
texts.en:
Merlinda started working with Emprender in 2005, she sells food in a bus stop, she is well known because she also has a minibus for public transportation, she is a very hardworking lady that learned to be independent from a young age and now she supports herself, she doesn’t have children and she is studying dentistry in the public university, she is thinking of opening her own office once she finishes school. The loan will be invested to purchase ingredients like rice, pasta, flour and vegetables for the kitchen. She is a very responsible and punctual client.

Translated from Spanish by Sofia Burt, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy ingredients to make food

loans.name: Magda Ivania

texts.es: Doña Magda habita en un barrio de la capital de Managua que se llama Laureles Sur, tiene 63 años de edad,  con un hijo mayor de edad, trabaja y la ayuda, la Sra. Magda trabaja en manualidades pero también recibe una pensión de jubilada, su experiencia son quince años, lo cual comenzó con fondos propios del salario que ella ganaba con su trabajo, ahora sus dificultades son el no poder trabajar el tiempo completo ya que abecés le duelen sus manos y no trabaja ese día, hasta que le pasa el dolor, con esta solicitud seria la séptima que  hace en nuestra institución de Afodenic, lo cual ha logrado hacer mejoras a su vivienda y desea con este préstamo hacer el frente de su casa ya que una parte la tiene con lamina de zinc, lo cual desea estar un poco mas segura de la delincuencia. A largo plazo desea invertir en su negocio para obtener ganancias y ayudar a su único hijo.
texts.en:
Magda lives in the Laureles Sur neighborhood of the capital of Managua. She is 63 years old, and has a grown-up son who works and helps her. Magda works as a craftswoman, and receives a retirement pension as well. She has been making crafts for 5 years, which she began with her own money. Now her difficulty is that she cannot work full time because her hand hurt and cannot continue working until the pain passes. This loan will be the seventh that she has received from Afodenic, with which she has been able to improve her home. With this loan she wishes to revamp the front of her house, as one part is covered in zinc, and she would like to make it a little safer from the local criminals. In the long run she would like to invest in her business to increase her earnings and help her only son.

Translated from Spanish by Jordan Shanker, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase construction materials to fortify the front of her home.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es: Juana tiene 50 años, vive sola. Toda su vida ha estado dedicada a las tareas agrícolas y a la crianza de animales, cada día se levanta muy temprano para ver sus tierras de cultivo, eso es lo que le mantiene vital y llena de energías para poder seguir adelante. Juana siembra papa, maíz, trigo y otros productos que se produce en sus tierras de cultivo. Además, tiene ovejas y pollos que ocasionalmente cría. Su motivación diaria es seguir adelante por ella misma. Es la primera vez que Juana solicita un préstamo en MFP por que se promete ser  cumplidora y puntual de sus pagos. Con el dinero solicitado podrá invertir en la siembra, comprando sacos de fertilizantes, además, comprará más ovejas para criar.
texts.en:
Juana is 50 years old and lives alone. She has worked in agriculture and the raising of animals her whole life. Every day she gets up very early to see her farm fields, this is what keeps her full of life and energy to be able to move ahead. Juana plants potatoes, corn, wheat and other products that grow in her fields. She also has sheep and chickens that she oftentimes raises. Her daily motivation is to get herself ahead. This is the first time that Juana is requesting a loan at MFP and she promises to be compliant and punctual with her payments. With the proceeds she will be able to invest in planting, buying sacks of fertilizers, and also she will purchase more sheep to raise.

Translated from Spanish by Laura Bobbit, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of fertilizers for her crops.

loans.name: Maria Azucena

texts.es: La Sra. Maria tiene 42 años de edad, habita en laureles Norte en la capital de Managua, tiene un hijo de 5 años de edad, que  va al colegio su esposo trabaja como mensajero, doña Maria es ama de casa y su esposo es quien la apoya, para hacer las mejoras a su vivienda ya que es el sueño de toda mujer ver su casa terminada, esta seria la quinta solicitud, en Afodenic y con este préstamo quiere poner cerámica a la sala a si como hacer una ventana de su cuarto ya que solo la tiene tapada con una hoja de zinc lo que es de gran riesgo que se le metan a su casa los vagos,   y así poder ver bonita su casa. A largo plazo es poder encontrar un trabajo de medio tiempo para ayudar a su esposo con los gastos ya que todo esta caro.
texts.en:
Maria is 42 years old, lives in North Laureles in the capital city of Managua. She has a five year old son that goes to school and her husband works as a messenger. Maria is a housewife and her husband supports her desire to improve her house, since it is every woman's dream to see her home finished. This is her fifth loan with Afondesic and with these proceeds she wants to put ceramic tile in the living room and also put a window in her room which is now covered with a sheet of zinc, this increasing the risk that vagrants could get inside. These improvements will make her house pretty. In the long term, she plans to find part time work to be able to help her husband with the expenses, as everything costs so much.

Translated from Spanish by Laura Bobbit, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of construction materials to put ceramic tile in the living room and install a window.

loans.name: Leoncio

texts.es: Leoncio tiene 52 años, vive con su esposa. Es agricultor desde su niñez, cultiva principalmente papa y cebada, de las cuales las ganancias se ven recién cuando se cosecha, es así que por años esta actividad le ha servido para educar a sus 5 hijos, que hoy son personas adultas,  y hoy sólo se queda con su esposa, ambos trabajan, aunque por el paso de los años ya es para ellos difícil realizar mucho esfuerzo físico. Leoncio y su esposa siguen trabajando motivados por sus deseos de seguir activos. Es la primera vez que Leoncio solicita un préstamo en MFP  y se compromete ser puntual en la devolución de sus pagos. ¿Qué hará con el dinero? 	La cantidad solicitada será usada en al compra de sacos de abono, de esta manera  aprovechará esta época de siembra para asegurase una buena cosecha.
texts.en:
Leoncio is 52 years old and lives with his wife. He has worked in agriculture since childhood, growing primarily potatoes and barley, profits from these are seen soon after harvest. This activity has made him able to educate his 5 children which are now adults. He is currently alone with his wife, they both work even though as years go by it becomes more difficult for them to do physical labor. Leoncio and his wife continue working motivated by their desire to remain active. This is the first time that Leoncio is requesting a loan at MFP and promises to make the payments in a timely manner. What is he going to do with the money? The proceeds will be used to purchase sacks of fertilizer, this way he can take advantage of this planting season to ensure a good harvest.

Translated from Spanish by Laura Bobbit, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase sacks of fertilizer.

loans.name: Leoncio

texts.es: Leoncio tiene 30 años, vive con sus padres. Desde su niñez ha estado dedicado a la agricultura, con años de esfuerzo y ahorro pudo adquirir una camioneta, la cual es ahora su actual herramienta de trabajo, con la ofrece el servicio de carga de sacos de abono, fertilizantes, urea y demás productos agrícolas y transportarlos a las tierras de cultivo. Este servicio que Leoncio proporciona es ahora indispensable para sus propios vecinos que siempre lo solicitan, esto lo anima a seguir con sus planes de implementar mejoras en su negocio, aunque él no ha dejado de dedicarse a sembrar sus tierras de cultivo. Es la primera vez que Leoncio solicita un préstamo en MFP, se compromete ser responsable en sus cuentas. Leoncio solicita esta cantidad para realizar un mantenimiento a su camioneta y también para la compra de fertilizantes para sembrar papa en una de sus tierras.
texts.en:
Leoncio is 30 years old and lives with his parents. Since childhood he has been a farmer. After years of effort and saving he has been able to buy a small truck, which is now his main source of work; he transports sacks of manure, fertilizers, urea and other agricultural products to the farming fields. This service that Leoncio provides in now essential to his neighbors which always request him. This inspires him to continue with his plans to improve his business, even though he himself has not stopped cultivating his own fields. This is Leoncio's first loan request at MFP and he promises to be responsible with his account. Leoncio is requesting these funds to do some maintenance on his truck and also purchase fertilizer for the planting of potatoes in one of his fields.

Translated from Spanish by Laura Bobbit, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Maintenance of truck.

loans.name: Marcelina

texts.es: Marcelina tiene 52 años, vive con sus dos hijos. Toda su vida se ha dedicado a las tareas del campo y a la ganadería, esto le ha servido para que durante toda su vida, en el establecimiento de su familia, pueda sostenerla, ella es madre de 8 hijos, de los cuales hoy solo vive con 2, y ella les enseña también lo que aprendió de sus padres acerca del cuidado de las plantas en sus tierras de cultivo, y también el cuidar a los animales con dedicación para que no sea una perdida cuando mueren por una mala alimentación. El trabajo de Marcelina consiste en levantarse muy temprano cada mañana, a fin de cortar pasto para sus animales, luego se va a sus tierras de cultivo, cuando es época de siembra, junto a sus amigas agricultoras también, se apoyan en la siembra, porque dirigir un arado requiere de mucho trabajo físico. Es la primera vez que  Marcelina solicita un préstamo en MFP, está muy contenta de poder formar parte de estos créditos, por lo que se compromete a ser puntual en sus pagos. Marcelina solicita esta cantidad porque desea contratar un camión que le servirá de transporte para llevar su cosecha en grandes cantidades a la ciudad, y vender directamente ella, sin intermediarios a fin de obtener mejores ganancias.
texts.en:
Marcelina is 52 years old and she lives with her two children. Her whole life she has been dedicated to farming and gardening, this has also helped her all of her life, in establishing her family and supporting them. She is mother of 8 children, still living with only two of them. She teaches them all that she learned from her parents about taking care of plants and the cultivating fields, and also about taking care of livestock properly so that they do not die from poor nutrition. Marcelina's work starts early in the mornings to cut hay for her livestock, then she goes to the fields and when it's time to sow, she does it with friends who are farmers because she needs help managing the plow, being hard physical work. It is the first time that Marcelina requests a loan from MFP (Kiva Field Partner). She is very happy to be part of this loan program, and she vows to be on time with her payments. Marcelina requests this amount because she wishes to lease a truck that will be used for the transport of large amounts of harvest to the city. She can sell directly herself without having to depend on middlemen, and will secure a better profit.


Translated from Spanish by Erika Lindig, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To transport her products to sell in the city.

loans.name: Martha

texts.es: Martha tiene 35 años, vive con sus 2 hijos. Se dedica a la agricultura de manera independiente desde hace 20 años, siembra productos de su zona, principalmente la papa, también cría animales como vacas, y ovejas, de esta manera puede enfrentar los momentos de escasez económica mientras espera la cosecha, ya que sólo se pueden ver los frutos una vez que se cosechan, por lo que Martha ahora, vende animales todos los días viernes en la feria ganadera de su localidad, entonces vuelve a comprar otros para luego revender. Es la primera vez que Martha solicita un préstamo en MFP, se compromete a  ser puntual en la devolución del préstamo.  El dinero será utilizado en la compra de más animales, dos ovejas, también un saco de abono, ya que tiene listo un saco de semilla de papa para ser sembrada en una área de terreno.
texts.en:
Martha is 35 and lives with her two children. She has worked as an independent farmer for 20 years, she grows local crops, mainly potato, she also raises livestock such as cattle and sheep, this way she can face the bad economic moments while she awaits for harvest, because you can only see the rewards once the crops have been harvested, that’s why now Martha sells livestock every Friday at the local livestock fair, she buys more and then re-sells. This is the first time that Martha requests a loan through Microfinanzas Prisma, she commits to be punctual with the repayments. The money will be used to buy more livestock; two sheep and a sack of fertilizer because she has a piece of land ready for potato seeds.

Translated from Spanish by Sofia Burt, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy seeds, fertilizer and sheep

loans.name: Miriam Teresa

texts.es:
Miriam es administradora en un gimnasio y se dedica a la elaboración de los implementos deportivos del gimnasio para los alumnos.
Es soltera y la única que genera ingresos para sus gastos, tanto personales como familiares ya que es independiente. Vive en la zona de Tacagua en alquiler.
Es la primera vez que solicita un crédito, las ganas de superarse e incrementar sus ingresos de dan la oportunidad de acceder a este crédito.
El crédito será destinado para la compra de materia prima (tela, hilos, y logotipos).
texts.en:
Miriam is the administrator of a fitness club and she makes sporting goods for members of the club.

She is single and hers is the only source of income for her expenses, for herself and for her family. She lives in the region of Tacagua in Alquiler.

It is the first time she requests a loan. She has great energy to improve her circumstances and increase her income, all thanks to this loan.

The loan will be invested in the purchase of materials (fabric, threads, and logo decals).


Translated from Spanish by Erika Lindig, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase materials.

loans.name: Maximina

texts.es: Maximina tiene 42 años, vive con su esposo y sus 5 hijos. Ella es natural de su tierra, Tayacaja, sus padres inculcaron en ella  todos los conocimientos  en cuanto a la agricultura y a la crianza de animales, es así que hoy en día ella aplica estos conocimientos, siembra papa, maíz, habas, cebada, quinua, entre otros, ella vende directamente lo que producen sus tierras. Adicionalmente, vende ovejas y otros animales que cría en su pequeño establo, los vende en cantidad, dos veces al año. Es la primera  vez que Maximina  solicita un préstamo en MFP y se compromete a ser puntual  en sus pagos. Con el dinero solicitado comprará insecticidas y abono para sus tierras de cultivo.
texts.en:
Maximina is 42 years old and she lives with her husband and 5 children. She is originally from Tayacaja and her parents nurtured the knowledge of agriculture and livestock care in her. Today she puts that knowledge into practice, having potatoes, corn, hay, quinoa grain plantations among others. She sells direct to her customers what is produced on her land. In addition, she sells lambs and other livestock that she raises in her small stable, selling in large numbers twice a year. This is the first time Maximina is requesting a loan from MFP (Kiva Field Partner) and she is committed to be on time with her payments. With the funds requested she will purchase insecticides and fertilizer for her fields.


Translated from Spanish by Erika Lindig, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase insecticides and fertilizer.

loans.name: Arturo

texts.es:
Arturo se dedica a la elaboración de piñatas y cotillones para cumpleaños, matrimonios, bautizos.
Trabaja a pedido con los comerciantes de la calle Illampu, lugar donde se comercializa todo tipo de trajes y cotillones para todo acontecimiento en general.
Vive en la zona de Alto San pedro de la ciudad de La Paz, tiene cinco hijos y uno que esta a su cargo ya que es el único que genera ingresos en su familia porque es viudo.
Es la Décimo tercera vez que solicita un crédito en Impro y la tercera vez que solicita el apoyo de Kiva, su historial lo califica como cliente 1 es decir con cumplimiento bueno en el pago de su crédito.
texts.en:
Arturo makes pinatas and party favors for birthdays, weddings, and baptisms.

He works with business men from Illampu street, a location where all kinds of clothing accessories and favors and sold for occasions in general.

He lives in the region of Alto San Pedro in the city of La Paz. He has five children and only one remains in his care. He is the only source of income of the family because he is a widow.

This is the thirteenth time he has requested a loan from Impro (Kiva Field Partner) and the third time he has requested the support from Kiva. His financial history qualifies him as Client 1, indicating that he has always made his payments on time.


Translated from Spanish by Erika Lindig, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Working capital.

loans.name: Obdulia

texts.es: Obdulia tiene 58 años, vive con sus 3 hijos. Hace más de 38 años, es decir casi toda su vida, se ha dedicado a la agricultura y a la ganadería, ya que esa es la herencia que le dejaron sus padres, así, junto a su esposo, sostienen a sus hijos. Obdulia siembra los principales productos que se dan en su tierra, pero últimamente, por razones de esfuerzo físico, el cual ya no puede realizar, le beneficia más dedicarse a la compra de animales enflaquecidos, para luego de engordarlos venderlos a un mayor precio, de esta manera puede seguir adelante. Es la primera vez que Obdulia solicita este préstamo en MFP, por lo que se compromete a ser puntual en sus pagos. El dinero será invertido en la compra de un torete más.
texts.en:
Obdulia is 58 years old and lives with her 3 children. For more than 38 years, meaning most of her life, she has worked in agriculture and raising livestock, an in heritance left to her by her parents. Together with her husband, she supports her children. Obdulia harvests the main products of her country, but lately, because she cannot carry out the hard physical labour, she prefers to purchase malnourished livestock to fatten them and sell them at a better price, and this way manage to pull through. This is the first time Obulia requests a lone from MFP (Kiva Field Partner), and she is committed to be on time with her payments. The funds will be invested in the purchase of another calf.


Translated from Spanish by Erika Lindig, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase a calf.

loans.name: Arturo

texts.es:
Arturo se dedica a la elaboración de piñatas y cotillones, para cumpleaños, matrimonios, bautizos.
Trabaja a pedido con los comerciantes de la calle Illampu, lugar donde se comercializa todo tipo de trajes y cotillones para todo acontecimiento en general.
Vive en la zona de Alto San pedro de la ciudad de La Paz tiene cinco hijos y uno que esta a su cargo ya que es el único que genera ingresos en su familia porque es viudo.
Es la Décimo tercera vez que solicita un crédito en Impro, y la tercera vez que solicita el apoyo de Kiva, su historial lo califica como cliente 1 es decir con cumplimiento bueno en el pago de su crédito.
texts.en:
Arturo se dedica a la elaboración de piñatas y cotillones, para cumpleaños, matrimonios, bautizos. Trabaja a pedido con los comerciantes de la calle Illampu, lugar donde se comercializa todo tipo de trajes y cotillones para todo acontecimiento en general. Vive en la zona de Alto San pedro de la ciudad de La Paz tiene cinco hijos y uno que esta a su cargo ya que es el único que genera ingresos en su familia porque es viudo. Es la Décimo tercera vez que solicita un crédito en Impro, y la tercera vez que solicita el apoyo de Kiva, su historial lo califica como cliente 1 es decir con cumplimiento bueno en el pago de su crédito.

Translated from Spanish by Erika Lindig, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: CAPITAL DE TRABAJO

loans.name: Uber

texts.es: Uber tiene 43 años, vive con su esposa y sus 4 hijos. Hace 3 años implementó un  taller de cerrajería en su propia casa, antes solamente se dedicaba a la agricultura y a la crianza de animales, pero como las ganancias no eran suficientes optó por ejercer un oficio adicional, cuando era joven se capacitó como cerrajero en la ciudad, ahora con creatividad diseña y fabrica puertas, ventanas entre otras cosas de metal, su destreza han logrado que los pedidos vayan en aumento. Uber está satisfecho, porque está dedicándose a lo que le agrada realizar en la vida y a la vez sostiene a su familia. Es la primera vez que Uber solicita un préstamo en MFP y se compromete a ser puntual en sus pagos. La cantidad requerida será invertida en la compra de fierro al por mayor, además de abono para sembrar papa.
texts.en:
Uber is 43 years old, he lives with his wife and their 4 children. Three years ago he set up a locksmith shop in his home. Before he spent all of his time in farming and raising livestock, but seeing that his profits were not enough he opted to take up another business. When he was young he worked as a locksmith in the city, and now with some creativity he designs and makes doors, windows and other metal items. And his skills have given him increasing orders. Uber is happy because his work is something that he likes to do in life and at the same time he is supporting his family. This is the first time Uber is requesting a loan from MFP (Kiva Field Partner) and he is committed to making his payments on time. The requested funds will be invested in teh purchase of wholesale steel and he will also purchase fertlizer for his potatoe fields.


Translated from Spanish by Erika Lindig, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase steel and fertilizer for his fields.

loans.name: Celsa

texts.es:
La Señora Celsa G. tiene su puesto de venta de ropas hace aproximadamente 8 años, en uno de los mercados más grandes y concurridos de Asunción.
Su marido tiene un puesto de venta al lado de ella y se dedica a la venta de artículos de electrónica. El matrimonio tiene 3 hijos, son menores de edad. Gracias al sacrificio diario de ambos, la familia goza de casa y comodidades para vivir. Son una pareja muy feliz y cuentan que tienen que abrir todos los días sin importar cansancio ni inclemencias del tiempo. Ellos siguen luchando juntos por dar la mejor educación a sus hijos.

La señora Celsa solicita el crédito para poder ampliar la variedad de mercaderías del puesto los cuales son cotidianamente demandadas en esta temporada. Estas prendas más vendidas son vestidos, camisas, faldas, ropa interior, bermudas y shorts.
texts.en:
Celsa G. has had a clothing stand for about 8 years, located in one of the biggest and most popular markets of Asuncion.

Her husband has a stand alongside hers and he sells electronics products. Their marriage produced 3 children, all are still minors. Given the great sacrifices made by them both every day the family enjoys a home and the comforts of living. They are a very happy couple, and they know that they have to work their stands every day, even through even they are tired or through inclement weather. They continue struggling to provide the best education for their children.

Celsa requests a loan to be able to increase the selection of merchandise of her stand, which is a daily requirement during this time of year. The merchandise most sold are dresses, shirts, skirts, undergarments, bermuda shorts and short pants.


Translated from Spanish by Erika Lindig, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase clothing for the summer season.

loans.name: Victoria

texts.es: Victoria tiene 48 años, vive con sus 2 hijos. Se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales desde hace más de 30 años, periódicamente vende en las  ferias ganaderas, generalmente después de 6 meses de crianza y alimentación balanceada que ella misma prepara, sus animales están en peso para ser comercializados. También separa algunos para su consumo propio. En sus tierras siembra todo tipo de tubérculos y granos y desde hace varios meses ella viaja a otra ciudad para vender en pocas cantidades parte de su cosecha. Victoria realiza este esfuerzo porque es el único sostén de sus hijos. Es la primera vez que Victoria solicita un préstamo en MFP, fue recomendada por su banco comunal porque saben que es responsable en sus pagos de devolución. El dinero será invertido en la compra de más animales, como un torete para poder venderlo después.
texts.en:
Victoria is 48 years old and she lives with her 2 children. She has been raising and selling livestock for more than 30 years, periodically selling at the fairs. Generally after 6 months of care and a well-balanced diet that she prepares herself, her livestock attain the weight ideal for sale. She sets some of them for their own consumption. On her lands she harvests root vegetables and grains and for the past many months she has travelling to another city to sell her harvest in small batches. This is the first time Victoria has requested a loan from MFP (Kiva Field Partner). She was recommended by her Community Bank, known to them as being resonsible with her payments. The funds will be invested in the purchase of more livestock, such as a calf to later sell.


Translated from Spanish by Erika Lindig, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase livestock to raise and sell.

loans.name: Victoria

texts.es: Victoria es viuda, tiene 32 años y vive con sus dos hijos. Trabaja diariamente en la agricultura y crianza de animales, como las tareas de sembrar requieren de mucho esfuerzo físico, Victoria ha optado por dedicarse más a la crianza de animales, los cuales sale a vender cada quincena en la feria ganadera más cercana a su localidad. Hace meses también empezó a vender comida en lugares públicos, ya que las necesidades de sus pequeños es lo que apremia para conseguir ganancias económicas, Victoria tiene grandes retos para sostener a su familia. Es la primera vez que solicita un préstamo en MFP, sin embrago ella se compromete a ser puntual y responsable en sus pagos, por lo que solicita un monto pequeño, que se ajuste a sus posibilidades de pago. Esta cantidad será invertida en la compra de más animales para su venta y también como capital para seguir potenciando su reciente negocio de venta de comida.
texts.en:
Victoria is a widow, she is 32 years of age and she lives with her two children. She works daily in farming and raising livestock, including sowing a harvest, something that requires great physical labour. Victoria prefers to raise livestock, which are sold every second week at the fair closest to her community. For the past many months she has started to sell foods in public locations, an idea fueled by the needs of her little ones, and the needs to have greater earnings. Victoria has great goals for her family. It is the first time she has requested a loan from MFP (Kiva Field Partner), and she is committed to be on time with her payments. She is requesting for a small fund, which is in measure with her financial situation. These funds will be invested in the purchase of more livestock for sale and will also use the funds as working capital for the upkeep of her new food sales business.


Translated from Spanish by Erika Lindig, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase animals to raise and sell.

loans.name: Julian

texts.es:
El Sr. Julián F. tiene 42 años de edad, esta casada con la Señora Zulma Insfran de 40 años de profesión ama de casa, tienen dos hijos uno en edad escolar y otro recién nacido.

 Julián nos cuenta que la casa donde viven la había heredado  de sus padres. Nos comento además  que  para comenzar su negocio  en el año 2003,  con un préstamo que adquirió de un familiar realizo las primeras compras y ventas de artículos de primera necesidad como: arroz, fideo, azúcar, etc. hoy día  gracias al buen ingreso  que  su negocio le genera puede cubrir los gastos de la casa y  brindarle una buena educación a su hijo.  
El crédito solicitado es  para la compra de mercaderías tales como arroz, azúcar, fideos, carne, lácteos, pan, enlatados, verduras y frutas, ya que se aproxima  la fiesta de fin de año y quiere aumentar el stock de su mercadería, para poder brindarles una buena atención a sus clientelas.
texts.en:
Julián F. is 42 years old and is married to Zulma Insfran, 40, who is a homemaker. They have two children, one in school and the other a baby.

Julián tells us that the house they live in was inherited from his parents. In order to start his business in 2003, he took out a loan from a relative. He made his first purchases and sales of staples such as rice, pasta, sugar, etc. These days, thanks to the good income his business brings in, he is able to cover household expenses and to pay for his son's good education. He is asking for a loan to buy merchandise such as rice, sugar, pasta, meat, dairy products, bread, canned goods, vegetable and fruit. With the end-of-year festivities approaching he wants to expand his inventory in order to satisfy his customers.

Translated from Spanish by Melissa Hays, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of meat, dairy products, canned goods, fruit, vegetables, oil, flour, etc

loans.name: Stefany Paola

texts.es:
Stefany es secretaria en una empresa de seguridad física, vive con sus padres en alquiler
Es soltera y requiere el crédito para la compra de una computadora Pentium IV ya que le servirá de gran manera para realizar sus practicas ya que al siguiente año ingresará a la universidad.
Es la primera vez que solicita un crédito, las ganas de superarse a nivel laboral y académico le dan la oportunidad para que pueda acceder a este crédito
texts.en:
Stefany is a secretary in a physical security company and living with her parents in a rental. She is single and needs a loan to buy a Pentium IV computer which will help her in a big way to finish her work placement so that she can enter the university. This is the first time she has requested credit, her desire to improve her work and academic level giving her the opportunity to access this loan.

Translated from Spanish by Susan Sanford, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase a computer

loans.name: Leonor Isela

texts.es:
Leonor se dedica a la venta de comida de lunes a viernes, almuerzos y los fines de semana, sábados y domingo platos extras.
Vive en la zona de obrajes sector sur de la ciudad de La Paz, en la casa de sus padres.
Es la primera vez que solicita un crédito, su experiencia en el trabajo le permiten acceder a este crédito.
El crédito será destinado para la compra de insumos (papa, fideo, arroz, aceite, y verduras).
texts.en:
Leonor sells food, lunches from Monday to Friday and on the weekend, Saturdays and Sundays, extra dishes. She lives in her parents' house in the manufacturing district in the city of La Paz. This is the first time she has requested credit--her work experience gives her access to this loan. The funds will be destined to purchase food supplies (potatoes, noodles, rice, oil and vegetables).

Translated from Spanish by Susan Sanford, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Gregoria Lurdes

texts.es: La Señora Gregoria C., tiene una tienda de barrio en la zona de Sopocachi, un barrio residencial de la ciudad de La Paz, Bolivia. Empezó vendiendo dulces, pan y refrescos trabaja varios años en su tienda y actualmente es más grende y surtida. Con el dinero que gana ayuda a su esposo en la mantención del hogar, es así que es una persona muy trabajadora y aspira a mejorar cada vez más su negocio y las condiciones de vida de su familia. Es una persona muy responsable, y buena cliente  de la institución. El crédito será invertido en la compra de productos al por mayor para asi proveer a su negocio  de productos para las fiestas de fin de año.
texts.en:
Mrs. Gregoria C. has a neighborhood store in the Sopocachi zone, a residential area of La Paz, Bolivia. She began selling sweets, bread and soft drinks several years ago and now has a larger shop with greater inventory. With the money that she makes, she helps her husband with household expenses. She is a hard-working person and aspires to improve her business and her family's living conditions. She is very responsible and a good client of the lending institution. The money that she borrows will be invested in the purchase of products at wholesale prices to stock her store for the holiday season.

Translated from Spanish by Melissa Hays, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of merchandise

loans.name: Mariana Patricia

texts.es:
Mariana es comerciante, se dedica a la compra y venta de perfumes, los acomoda en las oficinas. 
Vive en la zona de obrajes sector sur de la ciudad de La Paz, en la casa de sus padres.
Es la primera vez que solicita un crédito, ya que no cuenta con mucho capital y le será de gran ayuda ya que por el mes de diciembre sube la demanda de clientes.
El crédito será destinado para la compra de mercadería (perfumes, cosméticos, y cremas)
texts.en:
Mariana is a merchant who makes a living buying and selling perfumes, selling them office to office. She lives with her parents in the Obrajes neighborhood of south Lima. This is the first time that she's applied for a loan. She doesn't have much money for the business and the loan will greatly help her because demand for her products rises in December. She will use the loan to buy products (perfumes, cosmetics, creams, etc.) for resale.

Translated from Spanish by Jere Wiseman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Working capital.

loans.name: Floriza

texts.en:
Floriza is a member of the "Nobleza" (Nobility) Village Bank. Floriza is 29 years old; she lives with her common-law husband and their two children. Floriza buys young animals like sheep and pigs, then fattens them up, slaughters them and sells the meat. She also grows potatoes on a farm in Chiara, which she then sells in the Santa Clara Market.

Floriza is requesting a loan of 1000 soles (US$ 325) to buy young pigs to fatten up. She expects to be able to buy three pigs with 1000 soles.

Floriza has been a FINCA client for many years. Loans from FINCA have helped her increase her sales bit by bit, she says. Not only has her business improved, she has learned to feed her children more nutritious food thanks to FINCA’s educational sessions, given at group meetings. Floriza’s goals for the future are to buy a plot of land and to open her own store.

loans.use: Buy three pigs to fatten up

loans.name: Veronia Beatriz

texts.es:
Verónica es vivandera, se dedica a la venta de comida en su puesto de la zona de cota cota de la ciudad de La Paz
Vive en la zona de Cota Cota, sector sur de la ciudad de La Paz, en la casa de sus padres
Es la primera vez que solicita un crédito, que será de gran ayuda ya que le permitirá comprar insumos en cantidad y disminuirán sus costos.
El crédito será destinado para la compra de insumos (papa, arroz, fideo, aceite).
texts.en:
Veronica sells food items from her stand in the Cota Cota district of La Paz. She lives with her parents in Cota Cota which is in the south of La Paz. This is the first time that she's applied for a loan. It will be a great help to her because it will allow her to buy supplies in bulk and thereby lower her costs. The loan will be used to buy supplies for her business (potatoes, rice, pasta, cooking oil).

Translated from Spanish by Jere Wiseman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Working capital.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
Maria, es comerciante se dedica a la venta de pantalones de Jeans que los acomoda a crédito en los mercados de la zona de el cementerio de la ciudad de La Paz.
Vive en la zona de El Tejar de la ciudad de La Paz, en la casa de sus padres. 
Es soltera y la única que genera ingresos para sus gastos personales y familiares ya que es independiente.
Es la primera vez que solicita un crédito, las ganas de superarse e incrementar sus ingresos de dan la oportunidad de acceder a este crédito.
El crédito será destinado para la compra de mercadería ( Ropa y jeans).
texts.en:
Maria is a businesswoman selling Jeans pants on credit in the markets of the cemetery district of the city of La Paz. She lives in the El Tejar district of La Paz in her parents' home. She is single and has earned her own income for her personal and family expenses since she became independent. This is the first time she has requested credit, the desire to improve herself and increase her income giving her the opportunity to access this loan. The funds will be for the purchase of merchandise (clothing and jeans).

Translated from Spanish by Susan Sanford, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Rosa Ilda

texts.en:
Rosa is a member of the "Nobleza" (Nobility) Village Bank. She is 36 years old and lives with her partner and their three children.

Rosa sells construction materials such as bricks and sand. She also runs her own brick-making business in the Pacaycasa District of central Peru. She employs a number of workers, who make the bricks from Pacaycasan earth, then Rosa fires them herself in a rented oven and delivers them to her customers’ homes or construction sites.

Rosa is requesting a loan of 3,400 soles to pay her workers with. She has been a FINCA client for 12 years; over the years, FINCA loans have helped her build her house and buy a motorcycle taxi to rent out to a driver.

loans.use: Pay brickmakers' salaries

loans.name: Yola

texts.es:
Yola, es artesana en pequeña escala ya que elabora carteras y bolsones, que los teje a mano. Y también trabaja como empleada en un restaurante.
Esta separada de su esposo y es la única que genera ingresos para cubrir los gastos familiares. Vive en la zona de obrajes, sector sur de la ciudad de La Paz. En casa propia.
Es la primera vez que solicita un crédito, las ganas de superarse e incrementar su capital le dan la oportunidad para acceder a este crédito.
El crédito será destinado para la compra de materia prima ( lana e Hilo).
texts.en:
Yola is a small-scale artisan creating handbags and satchels that she produces by hand. She also works as an employee in a restaurant. She is separated from her husband and is on her own to provide income to cover household expenses. She lives in the manufacturing district of the city of La Paz in her own house. This is the first time she has requested credit, the desire to improve herself and increase her capital give her the opportunity to access this loan. The funds will buy raw materials (wool and thread).

Translated from Spanish by Susan Sanford, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Rosa Hortencia

texts.en:
Rosa is a member of the Nobleza (“Nobility”) Village Bank. She is 51 years old and married with five children. Rosa makes homemade ice cream with the help of her children; she sells it from home and in regional markets. She also buys cheese and grains from the markets and resells them to stores in the city of Ayacucho. 

Rosa is requesting a loan of 800 soles to buy ingredients like milk and food coloring. She has been a FINCA client for 14 years, and says that her business is much stronger today thanks to FINCA’s help. She has more clients and dominates more of the local ice cream market. Her goal for the future is to start another business.

loans.use: Buy milk and food coloring to make ice cream

loans.name: Trijidia

texts.es:
Trijidia es comerciante se dedica a la venta D. leche y chocolate, tiene tres hijos en edad escolar y su esposo tiene un taller artesanal.
Vive en la zona D. Alto Obrajes sector sur D. la Ciudad D. la paz.
Es la primera vez que solicita un crédito, las ganas D. superarse e incrementar sus ingresos D. dan la oportunidad D. acceder a este crédito.
El crédito será destinado para la compra D. mercadería (leche, y chocolates)
texts.en:
Trijidia is a businesswoman selling milk and chocolate. She has three school-age children, and her husband has a handicrafts workshop. She lives in the Alto Obrajes district of the city of La Paz. This is the first time she has requested credit, her desire to improve herself and increase her income give her the opportunity to access this loan. The funds are destined to purchase merchandise (milk and chocolates).

Translated from Spanish by Susan Sanford, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Elena

texts.es:
Elena se dedica a la compra y venta D. perfumes cosméticos, que los venD. en los mercados y algunas oficinas, trabaja con catalogo y a pedido.
Vive en la zona D. bella vista sector sur D. la ciudad D. La Paz. En la casa D. sus padres.
Es la primera vez que solicita un crédito, su experiencia como comerciante le permiten acceder a este crédito.
El crédito será destinado para la compra D. mercadería ( perfumes, cosméticos,  y otros).
texts.en:
Elena buys and sells cosmetic perfumes, which she sells in the markets and some offices, working with catalogs and by order. She lives in the Bella Vista district of the city of La Paz in her parents' home. This is the first time she has requested credit, her experience as a businesswoman give her access to this loan. The funds are intended to buy merchandise (perfumes, cosmetics, and other things).

Translated from Spanish by Susan Sanford, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth is a member of the Nobleza (“Nobility”) Village Bank. She is 38 years old and is the single mother of one child. She runs an Internet café from her home, and also owns a car that her cousin uses as a taxi in Lima. She plans to have the car brought to Ayacucho soon so that she can rent it to another relative to use as a taxi. 

Elizabeth is requesting a loan of 1400 soles. Her father was recently diagnosed with cancer, so she plans to use the money to bring her father to Ayacucho to care for him and pay for his medical expenses. She will repay the loan with her income from the Internet café and her taxi. 

Elizabeth has been working with FINCA for three years now. She says that FINCA has been a great help and source of support and has allowed her to expand her Internet café. She especially appreciates FINCA’s obligatory savings program, since other local financial institutions do not have such programs and it is very difficult for her to save money independently.

loans.use: Cover father's medical expenses

loans.name: Guillermo

texts.es:
Guillermo L. vive en la zona de Tembladerani de la ciudad de La Paz con su esposa, la señora Leandra Quispe de L. y sus dos hijas.
Guillermo es rentista de la policía y su esposa era vendedora en un mercado de la zona.
Debido a su edad avanzada la señora Leandra ya no atiende su puesto, del mismo que se hará cargo su hija. El puesto de venta estuvo sin atención mucho tiempo, por lo que necesita ser refaccionado para poder ser utilizada nuevamente.
El crédito solicitado será para la refacción del puesto de venta en el mercado de la zona.
Esta es la quinta vez que solicita préstamo y el análisis socioeconómico realizado califican favorablemente a Guillermo.
texts.en:
Guillermo L. lives in the Tembladerani zone of the city of La Paz with his wife Leandra Quispe de Lauara and their two daughters.

Guillermo is a retired policeman living on a pension and his wife used to be a vendor in the local market. Due to Leandra's advanced age she can no longer tend her market stall and is turning it over to her daughter. The vending stall has not had attention for quite a while and so needs renovation and repairs in order to make it usable. The loan money will be used for the stall repairs. This is the fifth time Guillermo has asked for a loan and based on the analysis of his socioeconomic position, his loan request has been approved.

Translated from Spanish by Melissa Hays, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Vending stall repairs

loans.name: Roxana

texts.en:
Roxana is a member of the Nobleza (“Nobility”) Village Bank. She is 26 years old and lives with her common-law husband and their three children. She weaves rugs and tapestries, which she then sells in the F. Vivanco market in the city of Ayacucho. She also sells cheese on occasion. 

Roxana is requesting a loan of 1000 soles (US $350) to buy two new looms for her workshop. 

Roxana has been a FINCA client for more than two years. She left for a time, but decided to return because FINCA gives her access to investment capital and helps her save money. “I left, and I felt like I didn’t have anything,” she says. “Here, I feel like I have something.” 

Roxana goal for the future is to increase her workshop’s production capacity by buying more looms.

loans.use: Buy two looms

loans.name: Paulina

texts.es:
Paulina C. D. E. vive en casa propia, en la zona D. Pasankeri, con sus dos hijos pues su esposo ha fallecido.
Paulina trabaja como obrera en una microempresa que realiza el trabajo D. alcantarillado en la ciudad D. La Paz, también realiza el trabajo D. lavandería para familias particulares. Paulina quiere construir dos habitaciones en su terreno, ya que las habitaciones que tiene resultan pequeñas para la familia.
El crédito será para la construcción D. dos habitaciones nuevas en obra gruesa.
Esta es la segunda vez que solicita préstamo y pueD. acceder  a un  crédito.
texts.en:
Paulina C. D. E. lives with her two children in the house she owns in the Pasankeri area of La Paz. Her husband has died. Paulina works for a small sanitation business in the city of La Paz and also takes in laundry from private households. Pauline wants to build two rooms on her property as the existing space in her house is too small for her family. The loan money will be for the rough construction of two new rooms. This is the second time Pauline is asking for a loan and is able to receive credit.

Translated from Spanish by Melissa Hays, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Construction of two rooms

loans.name: Encarnacion

texts.en:
Encarnación is a member of the Nobleza (“Nobility”) Village Bank. She is 45 years old and lives with her partner; they have five children. Elizabeth buys meat and animals in local markets. She sells the meat to local stores and also sells door-to-door.

Encarnación is requesting a loan of 600 soles (US $200) to buy more meat. She has been a FINCA client for three years now, and says her business is doing much better now than it used to. FINCA loans help her keep her store well stocked, and her savings account allows her to save her profits, something that is difficult for her to do on her own. Encarnación’s goal for the future is to expand her business even more.

loans.use: Buy meat

loans.name: Esperanza

texts.es:
Esperanza U. D. R. vive en casa propia en la zona D. Tembladerani, D. esta ciudad. Esperanza es rentista D. la Caja D. Salud D. esta ciudad. 
Esperanza hizo la construcción D. un departamento pequeño en planta alta D. su vivienda, misma que tiene un avance del 60% y falta la obra fina para concluirla.
El crédito solicitado será para la conclusión del departamento en obra fina.
Esta es la primera vez que solicita préstamo y el análisis socioeconómico realizado la califica favorablemente y pueD. acceder  a un  crédito.
texts.en:
Esperanza U. D. R. lives in the house she owns in the Tembladerani section of this city. Esperanza is retired from the health department. She had a small apartment built on the top floor of her house, which is 60% completed and just needs the finish work. She will use the loan money to finish the apartment. This is the first time Esperanza has asked for a loan and, as she scored favorably on the socioeconomic analysis, she is eligible for credit.

Translated from Spanish by Melissa Hays, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Finish construction of an apartment in her house

loans.name: Macedonio

texts.es:
Macedonio A. M. vive en casa propia, en la zona de Llojeta, con su esposa la señora Candelaria Jiménez y sus dos hijos.
Macedonio trabaja como albañil en construcciones particulares, también realiza cosecha en el área rural en temporadas.
La vivienda que habita aun no esta concluida totalmente, ya que falta el acabado en cubiertas y pisos.
El crédito será para la conclusión de su vivienda en revoque interior.
Esta es la primera vez que solicita préstamo y el análisis socioeconómico realizado le califican favorablemente y puede acceder  a un  crédito.
texts.en:
Macedonio A. M. owns his own home in the Llojeta area with his wife Candelaria Jiménez and their two children. Macedonio works as a mason in private construction. Also he does agricultural work in rural areas during the harvest season. The house he lives in is not totally completed and the floors and roof still need finish work. The credit will be used to plaster the interior of his home. This is his first loan request and the socioeconomic analysis shows that he is well qualified to receive credit.

Translated from Spanish by Melissa Hays, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Home improvement

loans.name: Lucy

texts.en:
Lucy is a member of the Nobleza (“Nobility”) Village Bank. She is 30 years old and is the single mother of two children. 

Lucy makes woven blankets and rugs, which she sells in the Santa Clara market in the city of Ayacucho. She is requesting a loan of 1000 soles (US $350) to buy more materials like yarn, wool and dyes to make blankets. 

Lucy has been a FINCA client for many years. She says FINCA has helped her business grow, and is grateful for the support FINCA has provided her with. Lucy’s goal for the future is to expand her business and sell more of her weavings.

loans.use: Buy material to make blankets

loans.name: Yeni

texts.es: Yeni es una madre de 29 años, vive con su esposo y sus dos hijos. Es agricultora desde que se casó, lo cual es hace 6 años, desde entonces tuvo que trabajar para cubrir los gastos de  sus hijos. Además, le agrada dedicarse a la agricultura, ya que sus terrenos de cultivos están cercanos su hogar y evita tener largas horas de caminata, sobre todo, porque puede trabajar con sus pequeños bebes. Sumado a ello, las naranjas que ella cultiva son muy vendidas en los mercados, los precios son favorables para sus ganancias, ya que por la temporada hay una fuerte demanda de estos productos. Lo difícil es sembrar, porque requiere de mucho esfuerzo en preparar la tierra para las plantas y abonarlas. Es su segundo préstamo con MFP, no tuvo problemas en  sus pagos. Yeni invertirá el dinero que solicita en la compra de insecticidas para cuidar sus cultivos de los insectos que dañan su producción.
texts.en:
Yeni is 29-years-old and lives with her husband and two children. Since her marriage six years ago she has to work in agriculture to help support her family but she also enjoys her work now that she is able to work land that is close to her home and she does not have to travel far. She also enjoys the fact that she can work with her children at her side. The oranges she grows sell very well in the markets and she gets a good price. There is strong demand during the season for her produce. The difficult part of her business is planting the trees because it takes a great deal of work to prepare the land and fertilize it. This is Yeni’s second loan with MFP and she has had no problems paying her prior loan. Yeni will use the money she is asking for to purchase insecticides to protect her trees and oranges from insects that damage the yield.

Translated from Spanish by Ann Molloy, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of insecticides for her crops

loans.name: Alfredo

texts.es: Alfredo tiene 30 años, es casado, vive con su esposa y sus dos hijos. Es agricultor, esta actividad la realiza desde hace 10 años, prácticamente  desde que se casó, con ella puede mantener su hogar,  es por ello que se dedica a ello con mucho esfuerzo y empeño, además le agrada poder sembrar papa y maíz en sus terrenos, pero sobre todo le  gusta cosechar, ya que después de la cosecha puede disfrutar de la calidad de sus productos. Dentro de su  ciudad la venta de papa es rentable, según la calidad de papa que producen, pero por lo general la producción de papa por su zona es muy buena y tiene  gran demanda. Lo difícil  es la misma siembra, además de los costosos de los abonos que requiere. Este es su primer préstamo con MFP. Alfredo invertirá en la compra de abonos para sus terrenos de papa.
texts.en:
Alfredo is 30-years-old and lives with his wife and two children. He has been a farmer for 10 years, since the time of his marriage. This work enables him to support his family and it is for this reason that he works so hard and with such determination. He enjoys planting potatoes and corn on his land and he likes harvesting even more because this is when he can see and appreciate the high quality of his products. In his city, the sale of potatoes is profitable depending on the quality of potatoes produced. In general, the production of potatoes in his area is good and there is a great demand for them. The most difficult part of the business is planting season, especially with the cost of fertilizers that are necessary for good yield. This is Alfredo’s first loan through MFP; he plans to purchase fertilizer for his potato fields.

Translated from Spanish by Ann Molloy, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of fertilizer for his crops.

loans.name: Francisca

texts.es: Francisca es una señora D. 53 años, viuda, vive con su hijo. Ella se dedica a la agricultura y a la crianza D. animales por más D. 40 años. Dentro D. todas las actividades que realiza, lo que mayormente le gusta hacer es criar a sus animales, sobre todo sus vaquitas, a las que todas las mañanas orD.ña para sacar la deliciosa leche fresca, y venderla o procesar quesos con ella, lo cual es muy rentable, ya que los lleva a las ferias para venderlos a precios que compensen su trabajo. A la mayoría las personas les agrada consumir leche y queso y Francisca sólo tiene que bien alimentar a sus vacas para que puedan  producir mayor cantidad. Lo difícil es cuando estas vaquitas tienen sus crías y la producción minora por un lapso D. tiempo. Este es su primer préstamo con MFP. Con el dinero que solicita Francisca desea adquirir una nueva vaquita.
texts.en:
Francisca is a 53-year-old widow who lives with her son. She worked in agriculture and has raised animals for more than 40 years. Out of all of her projects, she enjoys raising cattle the most. She goes out every morning to milk her cows in order to get the delicious, fresh milk that she sells or makes into cheese, which is a very profitable business. She takes the cheese to various markets where she sells them at prices that make all her hard work worth it. Many people enjoy drinking milk and eating cheese and all Francisca has to do is feed her cows well for them to produce in greater quantities. The most difficult time for her business is when her cows have calves and their production for her business diminishes for a period of time. This is Francisca’s first loan with MFP; she plans to purchase another cow with the money she wishes to borrow.

Translated from Spanish by Ann Molloy, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase a milk producing cow

loans.name: Abraham

texts.es: Abraham tiene 32 años, es casado, vive con su esposa y sus  tres hijos. Él es un humilde agricultor, actividad que inició cuando formó su familia. Desde entonces se dedica al cultivo de diversas frutas, pero dentro de todas, lo que más le agrada producir son las naranjas, ya que necesitan menos inversión y esfuerzo físico, ya que después de sembrar sólo se tiene que esperar la cosecha, claro que teniendo ciertos cuidados con la limpieza de tus terrenos. Es muy rentable ya que este producto es de fácil venta, por la gran demanda. Para ello hay que tener sumo cuidado y paciencia para sembrar las plantas de manera adecuada, en  tierras propicias y debidamente abonadas para su crecimiento. Es su segundo préstamo con MFP, y no tuvo problemas hasta el momento en  sus pagos. Abraham comprará abonos e insecticidas para sus terrenos de naranjales.
texts.en:
Abraham is 32 years old, married, and lives with his wife and three children. He has been a humble farmer since he started a family. Since then, he has cultivated a diverse range of fruits. Above all, what he most wants to produce are oranges since they need less investment and physical labor. After planting, he only has to wait for the harvest, of course being careful with the maintenance of his land. It's a very profitable product since it easy to sell due to high demand. He has to take great care and patience to sow the plants in the appropriate way, on fertile land properly fertilized for the plants' growth. This is his second loan with MFP and, to date, he has had no problems with his payments. Abraham will buy fertilizer and insecticide for his orange grove.

Translated from Spanish by Amani Roland, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase fertilizer and insecticide.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.en:
Rosa is a member of the "Nobleza" (Nobility) Village Bank. She is 51 years old and married with five children. Rosa makes homemade ice cream with the help of her children; she sells it from her home and in regional markets. She also buys cheese and grains from the markets and re-sells them to stores in the city of Ayacucho.

Rosa is requesting a loan of 800 soles to buy ingredients such as milk and food coloring.
